content:
I need to make reference to HL7 as part of a manuscript in which I describe having a software program create an HL7 message with patient information that is then sent to an electronic health record.

Can anyone recommend any published HL7 references describing HL7 background/foundation or its general use in healthcare that would serve as an appropriate reference for a journal manuscript? I would like to reference 1-2 articles that provide an overview of HL7 for that purpose, but it's hard finding one that is really just an overview of HL7 with its past and current use.

@Fahd ahmad You can use any material from the website and just state that the information was obtained from HL7.org. There are a lot of trade journals that write about HL7 but that may not suit your needs. Also, there are HL7 books available through the store (links to Amazon). For a general introduction to HL7, you may try http://www.hl7.org/newsroom/HL7backgrounderbrief.cfm.
